title: One hurt in grenade attack on Quetta police station - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
QUETTA: One person was injured in a hand grenade attack on a police station in the Kachi Baig area, located on the outskirts of Quetta late on Sunday night.

Police said that an unidentified motorcyclist hurled a grenade at the Kachi Baig police station, which exploded near the gate. A passer-by was injured in the blast and was immediately shifted to Civil Hospital Quetta for treatment.

The explosion damaged the police stationâ€™s main gate and shattered windowpanes, but no injuries were reported among the police personnel stationed inside.

Published in Dawn, April 14th, 2025
